name: You Only Live Once
description:
YOLO is a life simulator. As with life, the only goals are ones you set yourself.

When you start, you are born with various qualities - hotness, intelligence and so on. You have no control over these.

As you progress through life, you will meet potential partners. If you want, you can date them, get married and have children. Not all partners will want to date you.

You can also decide to invest in your relationship or your career. This accelerates time. A strong relationship or career will require significant investment.

Eventually you will die. You will get a short obituary. Remember - YOLO!



*** This is a personal project ***
- You will find bugs
- It might not run on your machine
- Don't be mean and give me a poor review, just ping me @edbiden and I'll try and fix it ASAP :-)
